welcome2: Unlock Exclusive Discounts & Savings Across the UK!
welcome3: Join DiscountCard and enjoy unbeatable discounts on shopping, dining, travel, and entertainment. Whether you're looking for top deals or hidden gems, we’ve got you covered. Sign up today and start saving instantly!
welcome5: With DiscountCard, you get access to thousands of exclusive offers from leading brands and businesses. Easily browse, redeem, and track your savings with just a tap. Smart spending starts here!

_meta.description: English translations for Offer Details screen

review_modal.title: Give a Review
review_modal.failure: Failed to submit review, please try again

authentication.login_prompt: Please login or create an account to leave a review

loginPrompt.title: Please login or create a new account

deleteAccountConfirmation.title: Delete Account
deleteAccountConfirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

alerts.accountDeletionRequest: Your account deletion request has been submitted.

noActiveOffer.message: You haven't any active offer to provide discounts

profileDetails.title: Profile Details
profileDetails.description: The title of the profile page where the user can view and update their details.

businessName.label: Business Name
businessName.description: The label for the business name field in the profile.

businessEmail.label: Business Email
businessEmail.description: The label for the business email field in the profile.

name.label: Name
name.description: The label for the name field, where the user's first and last name are displayed.

password.label: Password
password.description: The label for the password field. The current password is hidden for privacy.

phone.label: Phone No.
phone.description: The label for the phone number field in the profile.

state.label: State
state.description: The label for the state field in the profile.

nationality.label: Nationality
nationality.description: The label for the nationality field in the profile.

editName.title: Edit Name
editName.description: The title of the bottom sheet when editing the user's name.

editPassword.title: Edit Password
editPassword.description: The title of the bottom sheet when editing the user's password.

editPhone.title: Edit Phone
editPhone.description: The title of the bottom sheet when editing the user's phone number.

editState.title: Edit State
editState.description: The title of the bottom sheet when editing the user's state.

editNationality.title: Edit Nationality
editNationality.description: The title of the bottom sheet when editing the user's nationality.

editProfilePicture.label: Edit Profile Picture
editProfilePicture.description: The label for the button to edit the user's profile picture.

updateSuccess.title: Success
updateSuccess.description: Message shown when the profile is successfully updated.

updateError.title: Error
updateError.description: Message shown when there is an error updating the profile.

passwordValidationError.message: Password must contain uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character.
passwordValidationError.description: Error message when the user enters an invalid password format.

phoneValidationError.description: Error message when the user enters an invalid phone number.

fieldRequired.description: Generic error message when a required field is left empty.

permissionRequired.title: Permission required
permissionRequired.message: Please allow access to your photos.
permissionRequired.description: Message shown when permission to access media is denied.

saveButton.title: Save
saveButton.description: The text for the save button in the edit modal when updating profile information.

loadingSaveButton.title: Saving...
loadingSaveButton.description: The text shown on the save button when the profile is being saved.

cancelButton.title: Cancel
cancelButton.description: The text for the cancel button in the edit modal to close the bottom sheet.

firstName.label: First Name
firstName.description: The label for the first name input field in the profile edit modal.

lastName.label: Last Name
lastName.description: The label for the last name input field in the profile edit modal.

currentPassword.label: Current Password
currentPassword.description: The label for the current password input field when editing the password.

newPassword.label: New Password
newPassword.description: The label for the new password input field when editing the password.

statePlaceholder.description: Placeholder text when the user is selecting a state.

nationalityPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text when the user is selecting a nationality.

imageUploadError.title: Error
imageUploadError.description: Message shown when image upload fails.
